skins.selfIntroduction: So you want to hear about my history? Absolutely! As the Iron Blood Type 1936A destroyer, Z26, I escorted Hipper and Scheer, and disrupted shipping with Z25 and the others. While doing so, I was defeated... and that's that!
skins.acquisition: I'm the Iron Blood destroyer, Z26! I look forward to working with you! ...All right, that should do just fine as an introduction...!
skins.login: Sorry, but only authorized personnel are allowed into the office... Oh, I guess you're authorized to enter. Welcome back! Let's give it our all!
skins.details: I hate snowstorms. One was the reason I got separated from my allies and captured by the enemy...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, slacking off is absolutely prohibited! ...You've already finished your work? I-in that case... Well done!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Zed's good at studying, and Lebe's good at sports... so I should aim to... study while playing sports? W-will I manage?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I wonder if Z25's Mr. Anchor is actually alive... I mean, she's always talking to it, so...
skins.secretaryTouch: If you need assistance, just give me the order! ...Err, I mean, please let me know!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: No lewdness allowed! Ever! Full stop!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, welcome to my pad! Ah, give me a sec, let me go grab all the snacks and drinks and games!
skins.acquisition: Commander, welcome to my pad! Ah, give me a sec, let me go grab all the snacks and drinks and games!
skins.login: Sorry to keep you waiting! These are all my belongings! ...I mean, uhh, these are all my snacks and games!
skins.details: Spee really likes these bugle crunches a whole lot. Do you like them too, Commander? Then, open up, I'll chuck a few in for you!
skins.secretaryIdle1: U96 pwned me again! Maybe I should practice more with Ryuujou before challenging her... Oh, Commander, I'm talking about a fighting game I've been playing with U96 and the others!
skins.secretaryIdle2: If you're tired, you should try hugging Sharky and taking a nap! ...Ah, I meant that Sharky pillow on the bed!
skins.secretaryIdle3: My sisters are always telling me not to spend too much time gaming. But since it's my day off, does it reallly matter how much I play?
skins.secretaryTouch: Press this button to start a new game! ...Um, Commander, weren't you asking about where the start button is?
